: : Kup : :
Kup: Slim, black, a panther/bird fuzor. She also has a blue orb of some kind on her forehead.
Kup then hears Elita crying, and picks her up.
Kup: Did Elita hurt herself? You'll be ok, little lass.
He holds her to his shoulder.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::
Her voice deeper and rougher than before. "Nightlight. What's this 
bot look like?"
